messages.subject: 11 Popular Misconceptions
messages.msgSnippet: Greetings, I am new here.  I went to the link for 11 Popular Misconceptions About the Samurai but it is broken.  I didn t find them listed in the messages.
messages.messageBody:
Greetings,

I am new here. I went to the link for '11 Popular Misconceptions About the Samurai" but it is broken. I didn't find them listed in the messages. Are they listed elsewhere? I don't want to embarass myself,and perhaps I'll get a chuckle.

Thanks,

Ty
